en.title: 3 QP Wearers, BoxxWarriors, Wins Kedah Open Muay Thai Championships!
en.content:
REPORT BY FE LEADER DIRECTOR AHMAD BAAHIR.

More than 10 Muay Thai gyms around Kedah, Perlis and Penang sent their fighters to compete in the Kedah Open Muay Thai Championships which was held recently in Sungai Petani, Kedah. BoxxWarriors sent 3 fighters who are all QP Wearers to this event.

Firdaus Janai of BoxxWarriors won the Kedah Open Muay Thai Championship with a 2nd Round KO win against his opponent in the Finals (weight category 53kg). Fauzan Zabidi, another fighter of BoxxWarriors did his gym proud by beating one of Kedah's well known and experienced fighter in a 3 round TKO win. 

On the second night of the championship, Maman of BoxxWarriors fought well against his opponent to win by points in the Finals (weight category 60kg). His stamina and focus has helped him to win against the more experienced fighter. 

All BoxxWarriors fighters are FE Quantum Pendant Wearers and this has helped them in their daily training. FE Quantum Pendant and Quantum Flask provides them with optimum energy and improved their recovery rate! 

Congratulations to the BoxxWarriors Team and a big THANK YOU to FE for being a part of their success!  Ahoo! Ahoo!! Ahoo!!!
